verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:21
verses.text: Ye shall not eat of any thing that dieth of itself: thou shalt give it unto the stranger that is in thy gates, that he may eat it; or thou mayest sell it unto an alien: for thou art an holy people unto the Lord thy God. Thou shalt not seethe a kid in his mother’s milk.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:22
verses.text: Thou shalt truly tithe all the increase of thy seed, that the field bringeth forth year by year.
